transcript:
Customer: Guru Narayan roop hai guru gyan ko ghat guru Narayan roop hai guru gyan

Hello

Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir Mayank baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se aapka kaun bol rahe hain sir?
Customer: Haan boliye ji
Executive: Haan ye Shri Sunil Textiles mein baat kar rahe hain Sunil ji?
Customer: Haan ji
Executive: Haan ji sir aapki na services live ho chuki hai IndiaMART ki aapne services le li
Customer: Nahi main kal aapse mana kiya tha na pure correction kiye bagair live mat kariye bolke
Executive: Oh kisko aap bole the mere ko ki primary number Archit ka hai main bola mere se confirm karna secondary number aap hi khud hi bol diye the ki secondary number pe main call karta hun aur confirm karwata hun
Customer: No no sir
Executive: Aapne kyun live karwaya phir abhi?
Customer: Sir jis din payment hoti hai uske saat din baad service automatically activate ho jati hai aapki
Customer: Aise kaise automatic galti rahe to bhi automatic wo kaise ho jayegi?
Executive: No sir to aapko services nahi leni thi sir ye
Customer: Aise nahi leni thi matlab aapko customer nahi chahiye aise bol rahe hain aap?
Executive: Nahi sir matlab main wohi to keh raha hun sir aapne payment kari hai uske saat din baad service automatically activate ho jati hai aapki usme utne main wohi main wohi jaanna chahta hun ki aapko kisne mana kiya tha ki matlab jab jo services aap jis date pe batayenge us din active hogi main wohi jaanna chahta hun

Hello
Customer: Ab jab tak correction pure nahi honge wo madam ka bhi phone aaya tha kya naam unka wo bhi bole the
Executive: Sir connection kaise pure nahi hue aapki services to active ho chuki hai aapke products bhi isme add hai aapke catalog ka store bhi achcha hai bas main wohi wohi cheeze
Customer: Wo baki baatein chhodiye ji main kal morning mein do photo maine parso din Archit ne bheja tha aapko ek impact ka aur ek top plus ka top plus ka to ek hi minute mein ho gaya tha change photo change karna tha aur impact ka jo hai wo photo abhi tak change nahi hua
Executive: Catalog mein photo change karni thi sir aapke
Customer: Haan kal bhi baat hui thi aapse
Executive: Sir meri kal nahi hui hai aapse baat aapke jo
Customer: Meri aapki baat hui hai Mayank ji aapne bola ki Sohel bhai busy hai isliye main phone kiya hun ye bhi bola tha aapne aap yaad karo
Executive: Ek minute sir hold kijiye

Executive: No sir Mukul Kumar ji se baat hui hogi aapki kal
Customer: Nahi nahi Mayank ji aapse baat hui hai something sham ke hours mein baat hui hai 4-5 baje 6 baje
Executive: 6:50 pe aapki Mukul Kumar ji se baat hui hai main aapko unka number chahe to unka number bhi bata do aur aap mera number match kar lijiye Mukul Kumar jo hai wo
Customer: Nahi nahi mere ko us us debate mein jaana hi nahi hai mere ko aapse baat hui thi aapne bola tha ki main Mayank bol raha hun aur Sohel bhai abhi busy hai to aapke catalog ke bare mein jaanna tha to maine bhi aapko bataya ki ye do item ka image change karna hai usme se ek to turant ho gaya ek hi minute mein ho gaya
Executive: Haan ji images aapko day before yesterday bheja hua hai
Customer: Achcha to koi bhi sir aapko ye dekhiye sir mere according to meri aapse nahi hui hai baat kyunki yahan pe Mukul Kumar ji ka number Mukul Kumar ji ne call update kar rakhi hai kyunki aapke Mukul Kumar ji se baat hui hai theek hai wo main aapki baat samajh gaya but agar aapko catalog mein koi product add karana hai ya kuch karana hai to main aapko ek video meet ka link bhej de raha hun aap ek bar channel channel open kar lijiye apna mere ko bata dijiye kahan pe kya add karna hai kya change karna hai to main kar dunga abhi over the call aapka
Customer: Sir nahi dekhiye usme teen char baatein hain ki jaise ek image change karna hai impact ka wo image aapko bheja hua hai Archit ne
Executive: Haan ji
Customer: Theek hai dusra jo hamare product ke description hai na description mein aapne GSM mention nahi kiya humne puri list di hui hai GSM ki aapne sab jagah others others kiya hai samne wale ko product kaise samajh mein aayega kapda hath mein dete hain tab to koi bhi product hath mein lete hain to samajh mein aata hai uska kya quality hai yahan to description se hi pata chalega na bhaiya
Executive: Sir wohi cheeze to maine aapko guide sir dekhiye main aapki baat samajh gaya aapne sari cheeze aapke assistant manager jo honge unko aapne share kar di thi unhone add nahi kari wo main aapki baat samajh gaya abhi dekhiye account manager aapki
Customer: Awaaz low chali gayi aapki bahut
Executive: Hello sir aap ek hello sir awaaz aa rahi hai aapko ab aa rahi hai
Executive: Haan ji to main keh raha hun sir dekhiye aap ek bar apna aap ye IndiaMART se use karte ho laptop se use karte hain ya phone mein app se use karte hain?
Customer: Mobile se mobile se mobile se
Executive: App hai mere mobile mein un app abhi achcha
Executive: Haan ji to main wohi keh raha hun aap ek bar mujhe jo jo aapko jis product mein jo jaise main aapko dikha deta hun aapke 21 products aapne add kar rakhe hain isme theek hai sir
Customer: Ek minute main main speaker pe leta hun aur app mein jata hun phir apan baat karte hain ek second
Executive: Sir main aise nahi guide kar paunga aapko video meeting pe screen share karke dikhana padega mujhe main aapko video meeting ka dekhiye link share kar raha hun aapko ek minute haan sir
Customer: Nahi wo mere se nahi hoga main wo mere se nahi hoga wo Archit kar payega wo out of station hai main aapko batata hun na aap abhi app mein ja sakte hain na aap menu mein ja sakte hain na hamare
Executive: Ji ji ji bataiye aap
Customer: Haan to bahut badi baat nahi hai chhoti si baat hai utna correction karwa dijiye khatam ho gayi baat

Hello
Customer: Haan ek second jaise ki dekho abhi main products mein gaya hun
Executive: Haan ji
Customer: Lete hain apan first jo hai flora dikhai de raha hai
Executive: Haan flora teddy cotton bathroom towel
Customer: Haan to maine kal kya bola tha ye flora jo hai hamara brand name hai isko karna hai capital mein jo bhi brand name hai hamare jo puri list di hui hai jaise Arasai hai amaze hai aur ye ye word sath mein jata hai cotton bath towel ye hota hai ye teri alag kar diya towel alag beech mein cotton bathroom kar diya aise nahi hoga na
Executive: To naam bataiye kya rakhna hai iska
Customer: Sir flora rakhna hai capital mein
Executive: Flora capital mein okay sir
Customer: Ek ek aap note kar lijiye alag se paper pe jo bhi brand name hum diye hain na usko capital karna hai aur naam aise rakhna hai ki teri bath cotton bath teri towel cotton bath teri towel ye sabko same jayega
Executive: Description ye ye to sahi hai na teri cotton bathroom towel ye cheez sahi hai bas jo aapka brand name hai wo aapko capital mein karana hai
Customer: Main wohi baat bol raha hun aap ek ek cheez to likhiye jo brand name hai hamara usko capital karna hai ek point
Executive: Haan ek minute sir main pen note kar leta hun brand name aapka ek minute

Executive: Brand name capital haan ji second point
Customer: Second wo description jo hai uske sath mein
Executive: Ji description wo wording kaise hona chahiye ye cotton bath teri towel sabko same jayega cotton bath

Executive: Cotton bath teri towel ji no no sir description dekhiye sir description ka matlab pata hai kya ho gaya aapka description ka matlab hai hume 100 word mein us product ki wo cheeze deni padti jo uski specifications hoti hai yani ki uska overview ki matlab iski kya khubi hai kya wo hai ye cheeze batani padti description mein 100 words ka likha hona chahiye wo agar aap chahe to aap mujhe har product ka 100 words ka description likh ke mention karke de dijiye in case agar nahi hai to aap mere ko bata dijiye main google se download karke usme dal dunga
Customer: Nahi nahi iski koi zarurat nahi hai more than sufficient hai abhi to filhal ke liye
Executive: Sir wo main aapki baat samajh gaya but dekhiye actually kiya hun iske upar wo kahan aata hai isme details kahan aata hai iska edit mein jayenge haan to edit pe jayiyega minimum quantity 100 likha hai theek hai abhi ye jaise ye hai cotton kiya hua hai GSM 400 diya hua hai kitna hai iska others kiya hua tha kal to ek second main check kar leta hun usme no sir sir dekhiye wo cheez zaruri thodi na wo to aap bhi add kar sakte hain wo aisa koi wo nahi hai haan ji abhi ka jo hai 350 GSM kiya hai 350 GSM nahi hai ye ye kisne karwaya ye GSM ye galat ja hai sir aapka to koi complaint kar de ki aapne 350 GSM karke becha hai aur aapka 3310 hai to main kya jawab dunga usko
Customer: Sir kitna GSM karwana hai aapko bata dijiye main list di hui hai aapko
Executive: Sir aapne mujhe nahi bheje aap mere ko ek kam kijiye aap ek bar mere se pehli bar baat kar main aapko kaise denge bataiye na Archit ne bheji hai aapko Archit se ek minute conference pe leta hun Archit ko main
Executive: Haan ji ji Archit se to le lijiye conference

Apan ja vyakti shi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call hold var thevla ahe krupaya line var raha aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai krupaya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line apan ja vyakti shi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call hold var thevla ahe krupaya line var raha ab

Customer: Archit
Archit: Hmm
Customer: Wo Mayank bhai line pe hai unko batao kisko photo bheje hue hain GSM ke aur product change karne ke Tushar Tushar

Customer: Hello Mayank bhai aapne
Executive: Haan ji haan ji ji sir main line pe hi hun Tushar Tushar bhej dijiye bhaiya haan to sir main wohi to keh raha hun aap ek bar same same photos hai jo aapka GSM bata rahe hain aapke product ka jo bhi description hai wo aap ek bar mujhe bhi
Customer: Aapka number de dijiye aapke number pe chala jayega pehle wo sales manager the aapke ab baki jo bhi instruction hoga wo mujhse hi hoga aap mujhe message kariye bhej do
Executive: Haan ji message kariye bhaiya message kariye main aapko whatsapp pe message kar deta hun haan primary number pe message kariye wo bhej dega aapko haan theek hai sir theek hai ab baki sir ye video meeting kab schedule ho jayegi aapke sath
Customer: Super video meeting kis cheez ke liye properly explain kare sir sir ki services ke liye mere ko ek video meeting karni padegi aapki ki matlab jo sales manager the aapke unhone aapko kuch galat guide to nahi kara ya main kuch galat muh se nahi bataya aapko ya aap koi galat usme ho to wo sari cheeze mere se aapko pehle clarify karni hogi na to uske liye mere ko aapko video meeting pe aake aapki sari cheeze configure karwa ke aur uske baad aap services use karenge na aap aur main isko thoda extra bhi bata dunga aapko ki kaise leads aati hai kaise leads configure karni hai kaise inquiries aayengi wo to kab tak video meeting schedule ho jayegi aapke sath main wohi jaanna chahta hun
Customer: Kal ho payegi
Executive: Kab sir?
Customer: Kal ho payegi kal kal theek hai sir to main kal morning mein call kar leta hun aapko ek bar theek hai morning mein lag 11 11:30 ke darmiyan ho payega
Executive: Kis cheez ki sir?
Customer: 11 11:30 ke darmiyan hai na morning hours mein haan kar payenge
Executive: Haan koi nahi sir aap kabhi bhi schedule karwa sakte hain bas mere ko bata dijiyega ki kab free honge baki sir aapne ye jo complaint open kari thi na complaint ticket open kari thi ek aapki to ye to abhi close kar sakta hun na sir main
Customer: Kahan complaint open kari thi theek hai sir main complaint close kar de raha hun aur kya naam hai iska baki aapki kal ke liye video meeting schedule kar de raha hun aapka jab time suitable hai to mujhe bata dijiyega usme theek hai sir haan to abhi aap kya karenge Archit aapko image bhejega wo change karna hai GSM ka jo hai wo change karna hai haan haan ji ji GSM ka aap mujhe main abhi sir ko whatsapp pe message dal de raha hun wo mujhe Archit aapko image bhejega product ke naam ke sath image bhejega GSM wali to wo GSM add karwana hai sab product ko theek hai sir theek hai main uska aapne jo standard menu diya hai na usme hamare GSM nahi hai ji ji ji ji ji hamare GSM jo hai na wo hamare usko aapko edit karke dalna padega har item ke samne haan haan main samajh gaya sir aapki baat wo uske liye nishchint rahiye aap main usi cheez ke liye to keh raha hun ki main aap mujhe abhi bhej denge main edit kar dunga kal phir video meeting pe aayenge to phir sir mere ko bata denge ki haan ye correct hai ya galat hai agar galat hoga to nahi Mayank bhai aap mere ko hai na edit hote hi mere ko aap call karna main check kar lunga haan haan koi nahi wo aap main abhi sir ko message dalunga secondary number pe call karna aap haan haan theek hai theek hai secondary number wo ek to brand name jo hota hai wo capital karna hai haan haan ji ji ji theek hai aur wo jo sequence bataya tha wording ki wo ek change karna hai theek hai sir okay aur cotton karna hai kal nahi tha others tha cotton pe tick nahi tha aaj hai cotton pe tick theek hai sir theek hai haan ye jo changes hai wo karke aap mere ko ring karenge na to main ek bar dekh lunga haan haan main haan main abhi karke main aapko half an hour mein se call karta hun theek hai sir okay okay okay theek hai sir okay thank you message kariye
summary:
Concerns:

- Services activated without completing corrections.

- Impact photo not changed in catalog.

- GSM not mentioned in product description.

- Wants brand name in capital letters.



Resolution:

- Agreed to make changes to brand name.

- Agreed to change product description.

- Executive will schedule a video meeting.

- Customer will send the images and GSM details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call customer tomorrow morning.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, gsm, product description, image change, brand name
